net.minecraft.pathfinding.PathPoint

  • 使用PathPoint的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    net.minecraft.entity.boss  
    net.minecraft.pathfinding  

    • net.minecraft.entity.boss中PathPoint的使用

      参数类型为PathPoint的net.minecraft.entity.boss中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      Path EntityDragon.findPath​(int startIdx, int finishIdx, PathPoint andThen)
      Find and return a path among the circles described by pathPoints, or null if the shortest path would just be directly between the start and finish with no intermediate points.
